short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Servomancer uses AI to remove all non-playing time from the match. Requires an Tennis TV or Tennis Channel Plus account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Servomancer browser extension is essential for anyone with an ATP Tennis TV or Tennis Channel Plus account. Servomancer uses AI to find and then skip over downtime during a tennis match. Servomancer is very light weight and will not increase your data usage. We also do not collect any of your browser data.

To sign up, visit us at https://servomancertennis.com/
